When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you have questions for the OSS-Fuzz team, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues.

Before this was analyzed oss-fuzz closed it.

Post-analysis revealed that it was fixed by the fix for https://bugs.ghostscript.com/show_bug.cgi?id=698891

The fix is http://git.ghostscript.com/?p=mupdf.git;a=commitdiff;h=4dcc6affe04368461310a21238f7e1871a752a05;hp=8ec561d1bccc46e9db40a9f61310cd8b3763914e

This bug has been fixed for 30 days. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot
